import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' const AddTask = () => { const [firstOpen, setFirstOpen] = React.useState(false) const [secondOpen, setSecondOpen] = React.useState(false) const onTaskAdd = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value) } const newTaskAdded = () => { setFirstOpen(true) setSecondOpen(true) setTimeout(() => { setSecondOpen(false) setFirstOpen(false) }, 2000) } return ( //
